text:
@Mike_Pence Um, kids in cages.

No coherent policy on Covid-19 resulting in 1,000s dead who, if you & 45's Admin had acted sooner (or at all) to halt the spread, would still be alive.

Push to take away health care, including Medicare & Medicaid.

Forgive me if I think you're full of **it.
